## ScaleTrack.apply() method

Apply animation to node

**Signature:**

```typescript
apply(node: SceneNode, currentTime: number, duration: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | [SceneNode](doc/markdown/./scene.scenenode.md) | To which node the track will apply |
|  currentTime | number | Current animation time |
|  duration | number | Total animation duration |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if applied, otherwise false
